statements: SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy;
SELECT product_name, packaging_material FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy WHERE packaging_type = 'Biodegradable';
SELECT id, product_name, packaging_size FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy WHERE packaging_material = 'Paper' ORDER BY packaging_size DESC;
SELECT packaging_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy GROUP BY packaging_type;
SELECT id, product_name, recycling_percentage AS recycle_percentage FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy WHERE packaging_material = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy WHERE packaging_type = 'Biodegradable';
SELECT product_name, packaging_material, packaging_type FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy WHERE packaging_material = 'Paper' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, packaging_size, recycle_percentage FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy WHERE packaging_type = 'Recyclable' ORDER BY recycle_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy WHERE packaging_type = 'Compostable' AND packaging_size > 10;
SELECT product_name, packaging_material, packaging_size FROM eco_friendly_packaging_strategy WHERE packaging_type = 'Biodegradable' AND packaging_size BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY packaging_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_options WHERE cost > 50.00;
SELECT option_name, cost FROM packaging_options WHERE material_id = 4;
SELECT material_name, material_type, is_renewable FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE is_renewable = TRUE;
SELECT option_name, cost FROM packaging_options ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, is_renewable FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials JOIN packaging_options ON packaging_materials.material_id = packaging_options.material_id;
SELECT material_name, option_name, cost FROM packaging_materials JOIN packaging_options ON packaging_materials.material_id = packaging_options.material_id ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE eco_friendly = true;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM PackagingMaterials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT design_name, design_color FROM PackagingDesigns WHERE design_color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM PackagingOrders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, material_type, eco_friendly FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Cardboard';
SELECT * FROM PackagingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Cardboard';
SELECT design_name, design_color FROM PackagingDesigns WHERE design_color = 'Red' ORDER BY design_name DESC;

SELECT pm.material_name, pd.design_pattern, po.quantity FROM PackagingMaterials pm JOIN PackagingOrders po ON pm.material_id = po.material_id JOIN PackagingDesigns pd ON po.design_id = pd.design_id WHERE po.quantity > 100 ORDER BY po.quantity DESC;

SELECT pm.material_name, pd.design_name FROM PackagingMaterials pm, PackagingDesigns pd, PackagingOrders po WHERE po.material_id = pm.material_id AND po.design_id = pd.design_id AND po.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY pm.material_name ASC, pd.design_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM PackagingOrders;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, description FROM Product ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, material, size FROM Packaging WHERE weight > 5;
SELECT * FROM Supplier WHERE location='New York';
SELECT p.name, d.quantity, s.name FROM Product p JOIN Delivery d ON p.id = d.product_id JOIN Supplier s ON d.supplier_id = s.id;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, description FROM Product ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, material, size FROM Packaging WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT Supplier.name, Delivery.quantity FROM Supplier INNER JOIN Delivery ON Supplier.id = Delivery.supplier_id;
SELECT Product.name, Supplier.name, Delivery.quantity FROM Product INNER JOIN Supplier ON Product.id = Delivery.product_id INNER JOIN Delivery ON Product.id = Delivery.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Product;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Supplier;
SELECT material_name FROM PackagingMaterial WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, package_size, package_weight FROM Product JOIN ProductPackage ON Product.product_id = ProductPackage.product_id JOIN Package ON ProductPackage.package_id = Package.package_id;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Product WHERE product_category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, package_size FROM Product INNER JOIN Package ON Product.product_id = Package.package_id;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, material_name FROM Supplier INNER JOIN Package ON Supplier.supplier_id = Package.material_id INNER JOIN PackagingMaterial ON Package.material_id = PackagingMaterial.material_id;

SELECT product_name, package_size, package_weight FROM Product INNER JOIN ProductPackage ON Product.product_id = ProductPackage.product_id INNER JOIN Package ON ProductPackage.package_id = Package.package_id ORDER BY package_size DESC;
